contents.text: Welcome to Databricks, the Unified Analytics Platform in San Francisco that accelerates innovation by unifying data science, engineering, and business.
For information and sales inquiries about our platform, press '1'.
To learn about platform capabilities and pricing, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for platform details.

navigationGoals: Review enterprise pricing options and feature list
I need details on platform capabilities and pricing for veteran job-placement analytics
Review detailed pricing tiers and feature matrix for Databricks compute and storage offerings.
I’d like to understand the different pricing plans and costs of your platform.
I’m interested in academic pricing and platform features for processing large physics research datasets.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized demo with our specialists, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to a demo specialist.

navigationGoals: Arrange a customized platform demo with a specialist
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to see how Databricks can help me analyze veteran outreach data
Schedule a hands-on demo focused on Delta Lake integration with MLflow pipelines.
Could I schedule a walk-through of the platform features?
I’d like to schedule a demo on using Databricks notebooks and Spark for physics simulations.

contents.text: For technical support and billing inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a data import error in my account
I need help troubleshooting errors in my Databricks notebook analyzing veteran survey results
Get technical assistance troubleshooting my Spark cluster autoscaling configuration.
I’m having trouble accessing my account—can I speak to technical support?
I need help troubleshooting cluster startup errors in my Databricks physics data notebook.

contents.text: To discuss billing and account questions, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review my latest invoice details and update payment info
I have questions about billing charges and possible veteran discounts on my account
Clarify DBU consumption and overage charges on my interactive cluster billing statement.
I need help reviewing my latest invoice and charges on my account.
I have questions about billing for my student account and eligibility for an academic discount.
